description:
• 5 years of industry experience in architecting, developing or maintaining cloud solutions
• in public cloud environments.
• Hands-on experience with Dialogflow CX, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run, Cloud Build,
• Firestore, BigQuery, IAM, Load Balancing.
• Development experience on both front end (web) and back end. Comfortable with both
• JavaScript and Python.
• Hands-on experience with Generative AI, particularly prompt engineering and rapid
• prototyping of python code that consumes large language model APIs.
• Willingness to learn and an ability to provide clear, direct feedback. Committed to the
• team’s goals and direction.
• Preferred qualifications
• Having as many of these specific qualifications is a plus, but transferable skills/experiences may
• be equally valuable:
• Google Cloud PCA certified.
